# The `ScalarTraits` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class should be specialized by type that requires custom conversion to/from a yaml scalar. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

struct llvm::yaml::ScalarTraits&lt;T, Enable&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class should be specialized by type that requires custom conversion to/from a yaml scalar.

For example:

template&lt;&gt; struct <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/yaml/scalartraits">ScalarTraits&lt;MyType&gt;</a> &#123; static void output(const MyType &amp;val, void&#42;, llvm::raw&#95;ostream &amp;out) &#123; // stream out custom formatting out &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a939bc2108d47080767f0c06ba56caec7">llvm::format</a>(&quot;%x&quot;, val); &#125; static <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> input(StringRef scalar, void&#42;, MyType &amp;value) &#123; // parse scalar and set <code>value</code> // return empty string on success, or error string return StringRef(); &#125; static <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/yaml/#a2e9b09c50b4fff3bad8cba23daef8757">QuotingType</a> mustQuote(StringRef) &#123; return <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/yaml/#a2e9b09c50b4fff3bad8cba23daef8757a66ba162102bbf6ae31b522aec561735e">QuotingType::Single</a>; &#125; &#125;;

Definition at line 149 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/yamltraits-h">YAMLTraits.h</a>.
